normalized: there were faint noises in the night sea.
a person crawled up onto the deserted dock.
it was kurou yatsu.

name: kurou
normalized: shiit…, this is fucking ridiculous!
his eyesight had become extremely radical since he had become a taimanin.
he had given and taken life and come face to face with gruesome slaughters countless times.
but, that was the first time he had experienced first hand the destruction of a bridge.
the bridge connecting to tokyo kingdom had been abandoned both politically and economically, so it was naturally more vulnerable to terrorist activity.
maybe it was from the influence of the passing ships, but the blast had been considerably clean and much of it had sunk into the depths of the ocean.

name: kurou
normalized: （i don't want to think about it too much and i don't know if i was the target or not…, but why would they need to blow up a bridge for the sake of just one person?
he had a hunch that he was the intended target and it disturbed him that there was nothing he could have done.
he had somehow escaped the vehicle, but had lost consciousness struggling to get onto the coastline.

name: kurou
normalized: kuu…, i'm just a little hurt
he *still* figured he had several broken ribs.
he raised a shriek at the dull pains he *still* felt here and there over his body.
immediately following losing consciousness, just about every bone in his body was broken and he was bleeding profusely from lacerations.
now his accelerated metabolism was busy regenerating parts of his body that were still damaged.

name: kurou
normalized: christ, i'd be dead under normal circumstances
the gash in the palm of his hand suddenly disappeared.
the gash that had been perforated by iron scraps that flew out from the blast finally closed up.
if the wounds weren't fatal, they could recover.
that was kurou yatsu's ninja ability.
but, it hadn't yet recovered his extraordinary eyesight and likely needed a little time for it to recover.

name: kurou
normalized: （…it looks like there isn't anyone around here）
the blinded kurou reached out with his tentacle-like sensations and searched for any signs of life.
whether everyone had took refuge from the explosion, they were not worried about such things or because the night was falling on the city, he didn't know--
in any case, there wasn't anybody around.

name: kurou
normalized: （if we assume that explosion was intended for me, maybe asagi and sakura have been caught…）
he had told asagi that he was coming to get them through that computer.
so that likely meant that the both of them, converging into that spot, fell into the enemy's hands.

name: kurou
normalized: （if asagi got caught, i wouldn't have a chance alone…）
he took out a cellphone from his shirt.
he wasn't sure it still worked because of the blast, but the specially made waterproof cellphone still appeared to be working normally.
just as he was about to get in contact with the chief, he suddenly sensed a strange unearthliness and put himself on guard.
whether or not when exactly he had approached, a man stood clad in armor and helmet.
no, it wasn't a man.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: …a taimanin?

name: kurou
normalized: fuck…, a demon?
it bothered him that he was able to get this close without being able to sense him sooner.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: my name is sokushitsuki.
i have come to take your body

name: kurou
normalized: …huh?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: that body, give it to me

name: kurou
normalized: wait a minute.
alright, soo, you're expecting me to just hand myself over to you?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: not up to giving up quietly?

name: kurou
normalized: no, i'm not…

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: is that so…, i don't want to have to injure you if possible
they glared at each other for a moment.

name: kurou
normalized: （this demon…, isn't just any demon, but…, what?
it was a strange sensation.
it seemed to him that it was perhaps the strongest demon he had ever faced.
but, the unearthliness exuding from the demon didn't feel like other monsters.

name: kurou
normalized: （there's something different about this demon…, but what in the hell is it?
it was almost as if the strange sensation meant there was something lurking inside of the demon.

name: kurou
normalized: （moreover, this unearthliness…）
he was breaking out in a cold sweat from just being exposed to it.
sokushitsuki swiftly grabbed hold of the handle of the japanese style sword at his waist.

name: kurou
normalized: --chi!
the demon's fighting spirit swayed for a moment before wrenching free the japanese sword.
but, the long part of the demon's sword had only just been shattered on the asphalt.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: hoh…, come on

name: kurou
normalized: that is flattering to hear--
his right fist slammed into the demon's stomach.
moreover, at the same time, the survival knife he was holding in his left hand pierced into the demon's right arm.

name: kurou
normalized: --hah!
the force of the blow had knocked the demon off his feet.
this juncture of offense and defense had been kurou's victory.
he pinned the demon's chest down with his right foot and pointed his machine gun at him.
he unfastened the safety device to full automatic.
of course, the machine gun was designed in a way that ocean water shouldn't pose a problem to it.

name: kurou
normalized: you've already tasted some action, haven't you.
it looks like asagi really did a number on you.
i see traces of it left over

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: indeed…, you taimanin, are a really interesting bunch

name: kurou
normalized: as i thought, you quarreled with asagi?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: that's right…, i guess she nicked me a little…

name: kurou
normalized: what did you do to asagi?
you didn't kill her did you?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: before that…, what is your name?

name: kurou
normalized: kurou--, i'm taimanin kurou yatsu

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: is that so.
kurou yatsu…
the demon's eyes stared directly at him.
in spite of the gun nozzle pointed directly at him, he was frighteningly calm.

name: kurou
normalized: what?
do you have any last words before you die?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: guku…i will only sleep a short time… do your worst…for the sake of our friendship
the demon's mouth curled in a wicked grin.

name: kurou
normalized: what--
the demon's hand grabbed onto his ankle.

name: kurou
normalized: ch…, shit!
he tried to shake it off, but the demon did not yield.
the powerful grip of his hand wasn't letting go of his ankle.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: don't be afraid… i think you'll do nicely…

name: kurou
normalized: this…, what kind of trick is this!?
he pointed the gun with a jerk towards his forehead, but the demon was not the least bit perturbed by it.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: if you want to shoot me so much, shoot me

name: kurou
normalized: kuu--, are you that willing to die?

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: if you want to kill me, kill me

name: kurou
normalized: is that right!
gunshots rang out into the night's harbor.
without hesitating, he fired the machine gun directly into the demon's forehead.
the special bullets, refitted for monster extermination and anti-tank grade, pierced easily through the demon's helmet.
blood fluttered about in the succession of bullet holes.

name: sokushitsuki
normalized: guu!?
uguu!
round after round of extraordinary destructive power brought forth fatal wounds.
finally, the gunshots stopped as he let off the trigger.
no matter how strong the demon was, it should have been certain death.

name: kurou
normalized: uu…, kuu…
the demon's strength fell away from his whole body.

name: kurou
normalized: wh, what the…
it appeared that the demon was dead.
and yet, he was somehow still living.
some kind of mist seethed up and out from the bullet holes in the demon's head and began coiling around his legs like snakes.
his blindness consequently felt the unpleasant sensations--

name: kurou
normalized: wh, what is this…!?
he tried to escape them, but the dead demon's hand was preventing him from leaving.
『i will be borrowing your body for a little while』
it wasn't the demon talking.
the demon's body had no signs of life and was gradually becoming becoming colder.

name: kurou
normalized: guu…, th, this…, u…
his strength was being sapped.

name: kurou
normalized: （is this guy absorbing my life…）
he felt the mist plundering away his very own body.
he attempted to pull the trigger at it, but he couldn't even move his finger.
even if he could have moved it, it didn't appear that the bullets would have done anything to the mist.

name: kurou
normalized: sh, shit…
his strength fell away like it was violating his entire body with something.
he suddenly felt a sharp shrinking sensation.
he then immediately lost his eyesight.
he could see nothing.
it was a perfect world of black--

name: kurou
normalized: （what…, what happened?
the world that he sensed as a normal person was restored to a perfect darkness.
this terrifying darkness was what had woken up his taimanin abilities.
he could see nothing without those abilities.
『…do you fear the darkness?

name: kurou
normalized: w, who are you?
the shape of someone's face floated inside the empty mist.

name: kurou
normalized: y, you are…!
it wasn't anyone he had met directly.
but, he knew them…, he had seen them in data files.
『the sprout is freed.
as for the rest, it depends on asagi…』

name: kurou
normalized: gu!?
y, you, what are you planning…!
kuku…when the time comes, i will make use of that body
an exceedingly deep…, deep darkness engulfed his body.
and then, his consciousness blinked out of existence.
